Description: Login to ZIP with valid credentials
Navigate to 814 interface select broker 2981 and select one policy
Copy policy with LOB=P&C and Flat policy=1.(This must be 1 for only flat policy)
Select location from the maintain policy screen press F9 to add location
Select CA code from drop down in country, add address, postal code.
Add the coverages under the selected module
Quote and Bind to generate the policy
Enter the new policy number select 1 and in policy info select cancel
Cancellation requested and reason for cancellation must be provided from the dropdown list as they are mandatory also enter the flat policy premium and confirm
Navigate 814 interface and check the created and cancelled policy under specific broker (2981)
Validate Premium amount for the specific policies in 814 interface.
